Anwert MJML Boilerplate

How do you like that?

By the time you start reading this sentence, you have already made up your mind. In fact, your brain only took a tenth of a second to get an impression. So your newsletter layout must convince quickly.

That’s not easy at all. Because your company is not the only one that wants to attract attention. There are approx. 10,000 other advertising messages to which your customers are exposed daily. Obviously, nobody can take up this amount of advertising. The result: advertising blindness.

The alternative: direct news. In a world, in which advertisement is increasingly addressed to the broad mass, nothing attracts more attention than personal messages. It is therefore no coincidence that e-mail marketing is currently experiencing a renaissance. Thanks to legal regulations that prevent the sending of unsolicited advertising and SPAM mails, today only those messages that really interest the recipients end up in their mailboxes. The newsletter is thus becoming the most important tool in the online marketing mix directly after the website. As such, its planning and design deserve special attention.

To make it all easier for you, we have now published our Boilerplate project on GitHub.

Up, on to GitHub

See for yourself.

Internal newsletter of TMF

Together with the TMF Group - a leading provider of business services - we have developed an internal newsletter that keeps their employees up to date in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.

View

Email course from MindNode

We have shown the users of the MindNode mind mapping tool how to use the app via an e-mail course. Using crisp texts, clear graphics and short GIFs, we explained the features in a simple and playful way.

View

What matters.

Simple coding

Templates should make the life of developers easier, not harder. That’s why our template can be developed and tested on several devices at the same time.

Saving resources

Image size can be automatically optimized to save bandwidth and user time. All this happens without you even noticing it.

Independent of distribution tools

You use Mailchimp, Mailjet, the good old Outlook or nothing like that? Our template is designed in a way that it can be used independently of the respective newsletter management tool.

Easy to check

As in the household, the following also applies to coding: Small bugs can lead to great panic. Write clean MJML and HTML code using automatic validation via the built-in validation function.

Our Favorite Email Tools

For conception, text, design, testing as well as distribution and optimization, we have brought on board the best in their fields - with a toolbox of selected software, we build e-mails that inspire you in less than a tenth of a second.

  • MindNode To collect, structure and develop ideas.
  • Adobe XD For custom designs that are quick and easy to create.
  • Grammarly To compose clear, mistake-free writing.
  • Litmus Testing even those clients you've never heard of.
  • PutsMail Better safe than sorry! This allows us to test e-mails in real time before they are sent.
  • HTML to Text E-Mail Converter
  • Mailchimp Helps us to make your e-mails beautiful.
  • Mailjet Our digital newsletter manager. Instead of the carrier pigeon.
  • Really Good Emails Learn from the best.
